title: Chinese ambassador impressed by work of CPEC Authority
content:
The Chinese ambassador to Pakistan Nong Rong Friday had a review of projects under the China Pakistan Economic Cooperation with Chairman CPEC Authority Lt Gen (Retd) Asim Saleem Bajwa.
“Had a comprehensive review of the CPEC cooperation and discussed the way forward with Asim Saleem Bajwa,” the Chinese ambassador said in a tweet.
He said he was “Impressed by the work of the CPEC Authority led by him [Asim Saleem].”
Had a comprehensive review of the CPEC cooperation and discussed the way forward with Asim Saleem Bajwa @AsimSBajwa Chairman, CPEC Authority. Impressed by the work of the CPEC Authority led by him. pic.twitter.com/SCHeYpL8r3
— Nong Rong (@AmbNong) November 27, 2020
